meanings.definition: Wood from a fruit-bearing tree, used for making furniture or other items.
meanings.sent1: The table was crafted from sturdy fruitwood.
meanings.sent2: She admired the smooth finish of the fruitwood cabinet.
meanings.sent3: The chair made of fruitwood seemed to whisper stories of the orchard.
meanings.sent4: The fruitwood shelves held memories of sunny days and ripe harvests.
meanings.sent5: The scent of fruitwood filled the room, bringing a touch of nature indoors.

meanings.definition: The wood of a fruit tree, typically used for smoking meats or other foods.
meanings.sent1: The chef used fruitwood chips to add flavor to the grilled salmon.
meanings.sent2: The aroma of fruitwood smoke wafted from the barbecue pit.
meanings.sent3: The fruitwood chips crackled happily as they infused the meat with a fruity essence.
meanings.sent4: The fruitwood smoke danced around the ribs, creating a mouthwatering aroma.
meanings.sent5: The delicate flavor of fruitwood enhanced the taste of the smoked brisket.
